==Introduction==
We'll be using this to write documentation for the project. Go to the [http://jiscpress.blogs.lincoln.ac.uk blog] for project updates. Join the [http://groups.google.com/group/jiscpress mailing list] to get involved.

For updates to CommentPress, see the [http://commentpress.cc CommentPress] project website, join the CommentPress [http://groups.google.com/group/commentpress mailing list] and [http://code.google.com/p/commentpress/ check out the code].
